contact_desc: If you have any problem, you can contact our support team
call on desc: For times when you or your loved ones need support, particularly emotional support.
expert tip desc: For providing or seeking expert advice on a topic.
general tip desc: For sharing or receiving general recommendations on a topic.
paperwork desc: For helping someone with administrative tasks.
chore desc: For helping someone with everyday tasks or errands.
payment desc: For helping with financial transactions, especially international or Rial-based payments.
pick up someone desc: For helping someone by driving them to their destination.
pick up something desc: For delivering packages, whether within a city or internationally.
other desc: For any other form of help that doesn't fit into the listed categories.
help_desc: Do you want to see a short tutorial of how using the app?
help_1: From this section, you can add your posts or requests. These posts will be shown to the people you choose, and they can like them, comment on them, or make offers.
help_2: This is the home page where you can see and engage with other users' requests and posts. If someone has a request you can help with or an offer that interests you, you can submit your request here.
help_3: After you send your offer to someone, you can communicate here. You can cancel the offer you made. If the other person approves this offer, it creates a responsibility for you.
help_4: Once your offer is accepted or you accept someone else's, a task is created, which you can see here. tasks are shown by their completion date. After finishing a task, you can confirm its completion and rate the other person.
help_5: This section is your profile, where you can view your information. You can see and manage the list of people you're connected with. If you want to edit your information, you can use the dropdown menu above.
help_6: Here you can specify who should see the post you're making. You can make it public for everyone to see, or specify that only close friends or peers can see it. When you connect with someone, you're asked what level of connection you want. You can view and edit this list from your profile.
help_7: From here, you can specify the type of content you're posting. If you just want to inform, you can post. If you need someone to do something for you, you can make a request. If you can do something, you can make an offer.
help_8: Here you can write any text that's on your mind.
help_9: From here, you can add a photo.
help_10: If you want to make an offer or request, you need to specify what skill will be used and what category it falls under. For more information about these categories and their descriptions, you can use the main menu of the software and the skills editing section.
help_11: If your need is urgent, you can specify it here to show it to other users with an urgent tag.
help_12: Some things can't be bought with money! If what you have in mind falls into this category, check this option.
help_13: If you have a specific date in mind for your task, you can specify it here.
help_14: Finally, after completing the details, you can press the send button to submit your post.
first_time_help_desc: Because it's your first time, do you want to see a short tutorial of how using the app?
email_correct: Please enter a valid email address.
email_login_desc: Please Enter your email address. a code will be sent to verify this email.
otp_desc: We’ve sent an email with an activation code to your address
your_name_desc: Your friends can search and find you with this name

Reject_desc: Are you sure you want to reject this Offer?
unfollow_desc: Are you sure you want to unfollow this user?
post_desc: When you just need to say something
circle_1_desc: available only for your close friends
Is Urgent desc: If you feel that your request is urgent, check this option
Priceless desc: Some things can't be bought with money! If what you have in mind falls into this category, check this option.
due_desc: If you have a specific date in mind for your task, you can specify it here.
